description: NextSpark framework development - Full access to core, themes, and plugins

app.message: Prefer core/ for shared functionality or themes/ for UI. Direct app/ modifications reduce reusability across themes.

notes.coreGuidelines: When adding functionality to core/, ensure it's abstract and reusable across themes/plugins.
notes.themeGuidelines: Theme-specific UI and customizations go in contents/themes/.
notes.pluginGuidelines: Reusable features that can be enabled/disabled go in contents/plugins/.
